content: Singaporean Tamil actor and radio jockey **Jaya Ganesh Isuran** (born 3 July 1988) also known as **Jaynesh**, is a [Singaporean](/wiki/Singaporeans) [Tamil television](/wiki/Tamil_cinema) actor, [radio jockey](/wiki/Radio_jockey) and television host. He was well known for his unique hosting in Hello V Live on [Vannathirai](/wiki/Vannathirai), Hello Vasantham and acting as one of the main role as a police officer of Secret Society Branch ASP Raghav in the crime drama [Vettai](/wiki/Vettai_(TV_series)) Season 2. He was a former radio jockey in the Singaporean [Tamil](/wiki/Tamil_Language) radio station [Oli 96.8FM](/wiki/Oli_96.8FM). ## Personal life Jaynesh was born to a former [Vasantham](/wiki/Vasantham_(TV_channel)) stage singer and actor K. Isuran and mother V. Santhravathana. Jaynesh married Regina Raja in 2009 after being in a relationship since 1999. The couple has two sons. Jaynesh now acts in international movies. ## Filmography YearTitleRoleNotes2023*[Broken Script](/wiki/Broken_Script)*Amaran ### Television YearProgramRoleNotesRef2012*[Vettai (season 2)](/wiki/Vettai_(TV_series))*ASP Raghav2013*Vetri (season 1)*Vetri2014*Hello Vasantham*Host2015*[Vetri (season 2)](/wiki/Vetri_(season_2))*Vetri*Kudumbam United*2016*[Vetri (season 3)](/wiki/Vetri_(season_3))*Vetri*[Kalyanam](/wiki/Kalyanam_(2016_TV_series))*Paarthi*Takkaru Deepavali*Host2017*[Alaipayuthey](/wiki/Alaipayuthey_(TV_series))*Main cast*Saravedi Deepavali*Host*[Janani D/O Madhavan (season 2)](/wiki/Janani_D/O_Madhavan_(season_2))*Santhosh Subramaniam*[Thalli Pogathey](/wiki/Thalli_Pogathey_(TV_series))*Samar2018*Bimbangal*Main cast2019*Singa Airlines*Vishwa2020–2021*Kavasam*Karthik Siddharth2021*Deepavali Countdown 2021*Host2023–present*1943: Kappaleriya Thamizhan*Karmegam Kannan ## Awards and nominations YearAwardCategoryWorkResultRef2014[Pradhana Vizha](/wiki/Pradhana_Vizha)Most Popular Male Personality—N/aWon2016Most Popular Male Personality—N/aWonPeople's Choice Awards—N/a2021Most Popular Male Artist—N/aWon - Jaynesh Isuran on [Twitter](/wiki/Twitter)
